distinct
from SVC_MNG.TB_PRODUCT
order by ${orderByClause}

mapper.update:
update SVC_MNG.TB_PRODUCT
PRODUCT_ID = #{record.productId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LOYALTY_PRODUCT_ID = #{record.loyaltyProductId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PRODUCT_NAME = #{record.productName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PRODUCT_ENGLISH_NAME = #{record.productEnglishName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ENTITY_ID = #{record.entityId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CARD_TYPE = #{record.cardType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PRODUCT_TYPE = #{record.productType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
VALIDITY_PERIOD = #{record.validityPeriod,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
START_DATE = #{record.startDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
END_TIME = #{record.endTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CARD_FEE = #{record.cardFee,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REPLACE_FEE = #{record.replaceFee,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ANNUAL_FEE = #{record.annualFee,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MAX_BALANCE = #{record.maxBalance,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SUPPL_STAT = #{record.supplStat,jdbcType=CHAR},
CONSUMER_TIMES = #{record.consumerTimes,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RECHARGE_TIMES = #{record.rechargeTimes,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PIN_STAT = #{record.pinStat,jdbcType=CHAR},
INIT_ACT_STAT = #{record.initActStat,jdbcType=CHAR},
PIN_DELIV_MEANS = #{record.pinDelivMeans,jdbcType=CHAR},
SMS_SVC_STAT = #{record.smsSvcStat,jdbcType=CHAR},
EMAIL_SVC_STAT = #{record.emailSvcStat,jdbcType=CHAR},
MONSTMT_SVC_STAT = #{record.monstmtSvcStat,jdbcType=CHAR},
WEB_PAY_STAT = #{record.webPayStat,jdbcType=CHAR},
WEB_SMS_SVC_STAT = #{record.webSmsSvcStat,jdbcType=CHAR},
WEB_EMAIL_SVC_STAT = #{record.webEmailSvcStat,jdbcType=CHAR},
PRE_AUTH_STAT = #{record.preAuthStat,jdbcType=CHAR},
IVR_SVC_STAT = #{record.ivrSvcStat,jdbcType=CHAR},
ONYMOUS_STAT = #{record.onymousStat,jdbcType=CHAR},
AVAILABLE_ORDER = #{record.availableOrder,jdbcType=CHAR},
AVAILABLE_STOCK = #{record.availableStock,jdbcType=CHAR},
PROD_STAT = #{record.prodStat,jdbcType=CHAR},
CREATE_USER = #{record.createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATE_TIME = #{record.createTime,jdbcType=CHAR},
MODIFY_USER = #{record.modifyUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MODIFY_TIME = #{record.modifyTime,jdbcType=CHAR},
DATA_STATE = #{record.dataState,jdbcType=CHAR},
PRODUCT_DEFINE_ISSUER = #{record.productDefineIssuer,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PWD_KEY_INDEX = #{record.pwdKeyIndex,jdbcType=CHAR},
CVV_KEY_INDEX = #{record.cvvKeyIndex,jdbcType=CHAR},
BLN_KEY_INDEX = #{record.blnKeyIndex,jdbcType=CHAR},
VALID_PERIOD_RULE = #{record.validPeriodRule,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RSV_DATA1 = #{record.rsvData1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RSV_DATA2 = #{record.rsvData2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CHANGE_VALID_PERIOD = #{record.changeValidPeriod,jdbcType=CHAR},
REDEMPTIVE_SERVICE_RATE = #{record.redemptiveServiceRate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
NO_PIN_LIMIT = #{record.noPinLimit,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

DATA_STATE = #{record.dataState,jdbcType=CHAR}, PRODUCT_DEFINE_ISSUER = #{record.productDefineIssuer,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PWD_KEY_INDEX = #{record.pwdKeyIndex,jdbcType=CHAR}, CVV_KEY_INDEX = mapper.select:
SELECT T.PRODUCT_ID AS "productId", T.CARD_BIN AS "cardBin", T.EFFECT AS "effect", T.REAL_CARD_BIN AS "realCardBin", B.BIN_TYPE AS "binType"
FROM TB_PRODUCT_CARD_BIN T,TB_PRODUCT P,TB_CARD_SERIAL_NUMBER B
where T.PRODUCT_ID = P.PRODUCT_ID and B.ISSUER_ID=P.ENTITY_ID AND B.CARD_BIN = T.REAL_CARD_BIN and T.PRODUCT_ID = #{productId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND T.DATA_STATE = '1'

SELECT L.REL_ID as "relId", L.CARD_LAYOUT_ID as "cardLayoutId", C.CARD_LAYOUT_NAME as "cardName" FROM TB_REL_PROD_LAYOUT L, TB_CARD_LAYOUT C WHERE L.CARD_LAYOUT_ID = C.CARD_LAYOUT_ID AND C.DATA_STATE = '1'
and L.PRODUCT_ID =#{productId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT P.PACKAGE_ID as "packageId", TO_CHAR(P.PACKAGE_FEE/100, '9999999999990.00') as "packageFee", P.PACKAGE_NAME as "packageName", R.REL_ID as "relId" FROM TB_REL_PRODUCT_PACKAGE R, TB_PACKAGE P WHERE R.PACKAGE_ID = P.PACKAGE_ID AND P.DATA_STATE = '1'
and R.PRODUCT_ID =#{productId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select t2.product_id as "productId" from tb_sell_contract t1, tb_sell_prod_contract t2 where t1.sell_contract_id = t2.sell_contract_id and t1.contract_buyer = #{defaultEntityId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
